label: Facility
comment: The physical site (eg farm or factory) where the product or materials was produced.

datatypeProperties.comment: A unique identifier (URI) assigned to the organization or company. (Link Resolver - GS1 company prefix?)
The name of the organization or company, represented as a text string.
The Party entity responsible for operating the facility.

referencedBy.comment: The Facility where the product batch was manufactured.
